body_text:
Are ex-CP-9 members present in CP-0? In the chapter 801 of One Piece, characters resembling Rob Lucci and Spandam were shown.
Are the former CP-9 members really in CP-0?

Who and what are the members of CP 0? In One Piece during the dressrosa arc, it is shown that members of the world government's CP 0 were present on the island. 
What exactly is CP 0? 
Does this mean there is a CP 1 - 8 as well? 
And if they were stronger than CP 9, how did some of them end up turning into toys? 
I am current on the anime and manga and don't mind spoilers. I'm just confused about this.
